name: Drive Darkmode
additional_info:
Derivative of this style. Note: It whitens the default-color text on 'Docs' documents, and it inverts all the colors on 'Sheets' documents. If you notice colors look weird in Sheets, that'll be why. (It should only invert how bright the colors are, not change their hue.) Sheets used to color cells weirdly when using this extension. This was a bug in the style this is derived from, and should be fixed in current versions. The parent style also used to whiten all text on Docs, but now (hopefully) only whitens default color text, list bullet points, and changes link colors. Unfortunately, detecting background colors in Docs is hard, so disabling this when a background is enabled isn't feasible. I plan to give up on this style in favor of using an extension "Dark Reader". If you would like to take over this theme, despite Dark Reader being a very functional extension that doesn't need frequent updates by the user, I encourage you to do so. Changelog 2019-06-25:
  • Gave up on the style.
